solution_line_template: They made ${earnings_single_pieces} off single pieces because {num_single_pieces} x {cost_per_circle_decimal} = <<{num_single_pieces}*{cost_per_circle_decimal}={earnings_single_pieces}>>{earnings_single_pieces}

They made ${earnings_double_pieces} off double pieces because {num_double_pieces} x {cost_double_piece_decimal} = <<{num_double_pieces}*{cost_double_piece_decimal}={earnings_double_pieces}>>{earnings_double_pieces}

They made ${earnings_triple_pieces} off triple pieces because {num_triple_pieces} x {cost_triple_piece_decimal} = <<{num_triple_pieces}*{cost_triple_piece_decimal}={earnings_triple_pieces}>>{earnings_triple_pieces}

They earned ${earnings_first_three_types} off the first three types because {earnings_single_pieces} + {earnings_double_pieces} + {earnings_triple_pieces} = <<{earnings_single_pieces}+{earnings_double_pieces}+{earnings_triple_pieces}={earnings_first_three_types}>>{earnings_first_three_types}

They earned ${earnings_quadruple_pieces} off the quadruple pieces because {total_earnings} - {earnings_first_three_types} = <<{total_earnings}-{earnings_first_three_types}={earnings_quadruple_pieces}>>{earnings_quadruple_pieces}
